name: Gladiator Graveyard
description:
Rome has attacked your village, killed your family and many friends. Since you are a very strong warrior they have decided to capture you and use you in gladiator fights. Now the only thing left for you is to fight in the arena and delay your inevitable death as long as possible.

Github Link:  https://github.com/utkucnay/Gladiator-Graveyard

Credits:

Developer/Designer: Taha Yasin Mimarlar
Pixel-Art: Arda Algul
Developer: Utkucan Ay
UI: Dilan Güçlü
VFX: İlker Arkın Gölbaşı
